info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 13 at 5:53PM CDT until April 13 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR MADISON...CENTRAL RICHLAND AND NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN PARISHES... At 553 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Mangham, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Bakers around 600 PM CDT. Delhi and Waverly around 605 PM CDT. Tendal around 610 PM CDT. Tallulah around 615 PM CDT. Omega and Mansford around 620 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Mound, Baskin and Richmond. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
